2021180.name: Coloring Pixels - Summer Pack
2021180.description:
Summer Book

This Summer themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The season of Summer has been brought to life in pixel art for you to enjoy all year round!

Get your suncream and cold drinks and jump right into Summer with this new book!

Contents

The Summer book unlocks the following images:

  • Ice Pop - 40x51
  • Flowers - 67x98
  • Fruits - 71x66
  • Straw Hat - 83x60
  • Lighthouse - 86x86
  • Starfish - 88x63
  • Flip Flops - 90x84
  • Apple Tree - 92x86
  • Cold Drink - 97x106
  • Ice Cream - 99x142
  • British Summer - 102x143
  • Bicycle - 105x65
  • Sunflower - 114x135
  • Palm Trees - 115x137
  • Balloon - 122x121
  • Bucket and Spade - 136x172
  • Waves - 150x150
  • Pool - 180x265
  • Vacation - 200x150
  • Road Trip - 300x205
